comments.text:
I have a very old profile folder which I've used since essentially Firefox 1.0. One problem that I keep struggling with is that the list of downloaded files often clears itself right after a download is completed. 

When that happens, I can always download the file again from a site, and it will then appear in the list. So this problem is not because I have a setting to automatically clear the list.

When examining downloads.sqlite in a text editor, it's filled with old download entries, so I suspect it's due to a corrupted sqlite database? Unfortunately I can't verify that because I hit the Clear List button and that completely nuked the contents of the file. Maybe I also fixed the issue that way?

Either way, it would obviously be good if Firefox could detect corruption of this file and erase the file itself if that happens.

(May be a dupe of 583837.)
